name: Shroot 'em up
description:
In a world where the last root vegetables are under threat, one farmer - humanity's last hope - stands alone, between the vegetables and a leporid infested doom.

Grabbing your trusty weapon, control the farmer (WASD - mouse to fire) as he defends his crops against endless waves of adorable bunnies. Defend your farm plots, and more importantly, the golden carrot. In between waves, pick upgrades to improve your weapon and see how long you can survive.

Made in 48 hours during Global Game Jam 2023

Credits -

Art:  Jeanluc

Code:  Adrian, Mario Debono

Sounds & Music:  Daniel Sinagra
